actionCalls.label: Set Question Bank Id with Flow

value.stringValue: {"mentions":[],"message":"Nice work closing the {![Opportunity].Name} Opportunity! To get you rolling on implementation, we've added the Initial Implementation Opportunity to help track getting those {![Opportunity].Number_of_Non_Subscriber_Contractors__c} letters out the door. It will be in the Opportunity section of the {![Opportunity].Account.Name} account."}

Nice work closing the {!myVariable_current.Name} Opportunity! To get you rolling on implementation, we've added the Initial Implementation Opportunity to help track getting those {!myVariable_current.Number_of_Non_Subscriber_Contractors__c} letters out the door. It will be in the Opportunity section of the {!myVariable_current.Account.Name} account.
A new letter opportunity has been created for the New Client that was just closed.
